name: Saveyra Stickers
description: Saveyra Stickers is the best sticker app for sharing fun and desi Indian stickers with your WhatsApp friends. Impressing your loved ones is just a step away, download the Saveyra Stickers app now.  How to download the app and share stickers on Whatsapp: 1.Install the Saveyra Stickers 2.Open the Saveyra Stickers app 3.Tap on + OR ADD TO WHATSAPP 4.Tap ADD in the popup to Confirm 5.Open Whatsapp and open a chat window 6.Next to the text input field, tap Emoji > Stickers. 7.You will find the new sticker packs icons  8.Find and tap the sticker you want to send.  Our WhatsApp sticker app intends to celebrate the desiness of India with our Hinglish stickers. Whether chatting with your friend or girlfriend, family or boyfriend, we have stickers to express yourself . Show Off your fun side with our free stickers and be the boss of every WhatsApp conversations.   To celebrate Valentines Day, we have created WhatsApp Sticker packs, like Valentine Week, Heartbreak, Happily Single, Cute Couple Conversation, Long Distance Love, Untold Things, One-Sided Love, College Romance and more. Express your dil ki baat like never before with our Love sticker packs and Hindi Sticker For WhatsApp.   Were also adding more new stickers for WhatsApp and New Hindi Stickers so that youll never run out of things to say and break the ice Mogambo style. Watch out, theres more to come!
